title: llvm assert failure when compiling with extra-debug-info

labels.name: A-debuginfo
labels.description: Area: Debugging information in compiled programs (DWARF, PDB, etc.)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Compiling https://github.com/sfackler/rust-postgres with `-Z debug-info` changed to `-Z extra-debug-info` in the Makefile with a brand new copy of rustc (commit 124eb2119c78651cfaaa7a046a101fa2e20f83ca),

```
rustc: /home/sfackler/rust/src/llvm/include/llvm/ADT/APInt.h:238: llvm::APInt::APInt(unsigned int, uint64_t, bool): Assertion `BitWidth && "bitwidth too small"' failed.
```

Weirdly, running rustc in GDB ends up running off the end of the stack infinitely recursing in `debuginfo`:

```

   from /home/sfackler/.rust-local/bin/../lib/librustc-d3cb8c2ccd84a7a7-0.8-pre.so
```
